usefulItems: rolling pin, cast iron skillet (9 in.), stove
title: Quick Flatbreads

ingredients.content: 12 ½ oz bread flour, plus extra to roll out dough

preparations.content: Place flour, yogurt, baking powder, salt and sugar into mixing bowl and mix <b>15 sec/speed 6<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula and knead <b>1 min/<b>.
Transfer dough onto a lightly floured surface and bring together. Divide dough into 8 pieces using spatula and shape each into a ball. Roll out dough into thin circles (approx. 7 in.).
Heat a cast iron skillet to medium-high heat and cook flatbreads for 1-2 minutes each side. Serve immediately.
